item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 12/2013
item.description: Including: Almost Was Good Enough, Beck, Brother Hawk, Eric Clapton, Gary Clark Jr., Little Hurricane, Reignwolf, Rival Sons, Shakey Graves, Triggerfinger.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 11/2013
item.description: Including: Allman Brothers, Band Of Skulls, Left Lane Cruiser, Neil Young & Crazy Horse, R.L. Burnside, Reignwolf, Rory Gallagher, The Black Angels, The Greasy Slicks, Zombie Barricades.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 10/2013
item.description: Including: Dan Patlansky, Gary Clark Jr., Hillstomp, Kenny Wayne Shepherd, One Man Band Ben Prestage, Philip Sayce, Rival Sons, Robert Cray, The Black Keys, The White Stripes.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 9/2013
item.description: Including: Band Of Willies, Delta Moon, Hey Joe, Hillstomp, Pontiak, Srv And Jeff Beck, Taste, The Greasy Slicks, The Wild Feathers, Zepparella.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 8/2013
item.description: Including: Five Horse Johnson, Gov'T Mule, Groundhogs, Led Zeppelin, Lonesome Shack, Scarlet Runner, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Black Keys, The White Stripes, Zz Top.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 7/2013
item.description: Including: *Johnny Winter* Full Show, Blue Blood Blues, Clutch, Fleetwood Mac, Rolling Stones, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Barnburners, The Beatles, The Dead Weather, Them Crooked Vultures.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 6/2013
item.description: Including: ''Medicine'', Clutch, Gary Clark Jr., Jj Grey And Mofro, Rival Sons, Rl Burnside, Shakey Graves, She Caught The Katy, The Brought Low, The Stone Foxes.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 5/2013
item.description: Including: Back Door Slam, Band Of Skulls, Black Pistol Fire, R.L. Burnside, Rabbit'S Foot, Soledad Brothers, Taste (Rory Gallagher), The Bonnevilles, The Doors, The London Souls.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 4/2013
item.description: Including: Ain'T No Sunshine, Albert King, Buddy Guy, Gov'T Mule, Junior Kimbrough, Reignwolf, Rory Gallagher Live 1979, Scott H. Biram, The Shouting Matches, The Temperance Movement.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 3/2013
item.description: Including: "The Dying Song", All Around Man, Blind Boys Of Alabama, Gary Clark Jr., I'M A King Bee, Jackson Firebird, Led Zeppelin, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Delta Saints.
